title: CIO Story Names Paragon Solutions In 20 Most Powerful BFSI Tech Providers
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 10:20 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Paragon Solutions 
CRANFORD, N.J. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Paragon Solutions , an advisory consulting and systems integration firm, today announced its selection as one of the 20 Most Powerful BFSI Tech Providers for 2015 by CIO Story Magazine. 
Specializing in enterprise information management, Paragon’s Financial Services and Insurance group provides industry-specific knowledge, strategies and technologies that help some of the leading wealth management, global insurance and banking institutions implement digital automation to transform processes and optimize operations. 
Recognized as an advisory consulting and systems integration company specializing in business process optimization, information management and information governance, Paragon Solutions has served as a trusted partner to leaders and innovators of some of the industry’s largest Financial Services and Insurance firms for more than three decades. The company delivers a consistent and seamless client-centric customer experience across physical and digital channels focused on the highest level of data security and compliance. 
Additionally, Paragon’s deep industry knowledge and expertise offers a unique ability to understand the experience of customer-facing roles such as agents, brokers and operations associates involved in the end-to-end process. 
“We are pleased to be acknowledged by CIO Story and appreciate their recognition of Paragon’s commitment to innovation, strategy, technology and investment in expertise and solutions that deliver value and maximize profitability,” reports Daniel J. O’Connor, President and CEO, Paragon Solutions. “Paragon is committed to providing value to our existing and future clients and we will continue to collaborate with technology providers to develop and implement best-in-class solutions for financial services leaders, while keeping an eye on the customer service demands of the future.” 
CIO Story’s annual list of leading BFSI tech providers is selected by a panel of industry experts and executive members of CIO Story’s editorial advisory board. 
View the CIO Story article in its entirety here . 
About Paragon Solutions 
Paragon Solutions is an advisory consulting and systems integration firm that specializes in enterprise information management to help clients leverage information assets for better business results. The company does this through its industry practices, solution accelerators and specialized technology competencies that help clients achieve operational efficiency, business scalability and regulatory compliance. 
Paragon works with businesses that are focused in a few key industries − communications, financial services, healthcare, insurance, and life sciences. The industry-focused practices work with Paragon’s competency groups to address today’s client concerns in Process Optimization, Information Management and Information Integration.
